dataArray.name: Resume Template
bullets:
### Problems
1. I wanted a reusable component for generating personal website and resume.
2. I wanted it to be able to be used without forking the repository (but instead just modifying the data)

### Issues Overcome
1. The rollup typescript plugin did not want to export DTS files which made it difficult to consume the module in typescript
2. ES Module Interop was not being respected initially

### Skill Acquired
1. Learned how to build a react component library
2. Learned to use rollup to package up said library
3. Learned how to use storyboard to build and view components in isolation
4. Furthered my understanding to use React Contexts

dataArray.name: Mass Texter
bullets:
### Problems
1. My phone provider capped the number of people I could text to 30 at one time (regardless of mass or group texts.)
2. Sending a group text would make all the phone numbers visible, I didn't want to give out phone numbers without consent.
3. Sending a mass text would go out on a thread with everyone but responses would come back individually so context was sometimes unclear.

### Solution
1. Wrote an android app that would loop through a group of contacts and send out the texts individually.

### Outcome
1. All of the problems listed above were solved.
2. People were more responsive (due to the fact that they thought I was texting them personally).

### Ideas that were not Implemented
1. Templating: Having the ability to replace things like `{NAME}` with the contact name.

### Skills Acquired
1. Query contacts on android
2. Send text messages from android
